title: Watt

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Power Shock** (2x): Roleblock and Short-Circuit a target.
- **Turbo Charge** (2x): Boost a target's attack by 1 tier tonight, can self-target and be multitasked with the factional attack if no Koopa Killing is alive.
- **Mega Shock** (1x): Short-Circuit all Non-Koopa members tonight, disabling all their passives.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Once per game, you may use 2 abilities in one night, roleblocking and short-circuiting your visitors if you do so.
- Using the 2nd or 3rd abilties give the first ability an extra use.

desc:
Post 4358
*A baby Lil Sparky, small orb-shaped creatures who continually emit pulses and flashes of electricity, this one's wearing a pacifier.*
